website_summaries.verdict: This superb portable baby monitor offers room temperature tracking, LED indicators, and many other terrific features.
pros: Comes with a 2.4-inch color LCD display that delivers crisp, clear images
Provides high and low room temperature alerts
Automatically detects dim light, enabling you to track your child in both bright and dark settings
Easy to place the monitor on a tabletop or mount it to a wall
cons: Less durable than many comparable monitors

website_summaries.verdict: This budget-friendly monitor has some bugs, but many find it to be a reliable, competitive model for the price.
pros: Auto Infrared night vision lets you see baby clearly at night on 2.4" LCD display
Camera offers 2x digital zoom with pan and tilt option
2-way audio capability lets you soothe your baby with your voice
cons: Some reports of connectivity problems, which may be related to interference from phones and computers

website_summaries.verdict: With two-way talk back so baby can still hear you when you’re not there, this video monitor pushes all the buttons for safety and security.
pros: Has a range of up to 900 feet and gives a warning when out of range
High and low temperature alerts can be set so baby is always perfectly comfortable
Digital and wireless, providing a clear, full-color display
cons: Kickstand could be a bit sturdier
Some users would like to see a much longer battery life

website_summaries.verdict: If you want a monitor with useful features but don't want to spend a lot of money, it's worth considering in spite of a few concerns.
pros: Ample features include built-in lullabies, excellent image quality, and 900-ft. range
Sound-activated Eco mode is ideal for night monitoring
cons: Temp reading tends to be inaccurate

customer_reviews.title: Works with Smilism
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Smilism monitor and decided we wanted two cameras. Bought it in hopes that it would work and it does. Pairing was super simple and we couldn’t be happier! My experience with the video feed saying waiting for connection or if you see a bright white flash, the monitor is to close to an electronic device and is interfering with the feed. Example, phone, ps4 controller, tv remote control or external battery pack. It doesn’t need to be on opposite ends of the room from these devices just not right next to them.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Works with Smilism SM35RX, click OK to switch between cameras not Menu
customer_reviews.text: We received the Smilism camera a while back but they don’t seem to sell individual cameras anymore so I thought I’d try my luck with this one. It connected very fast with my Smilism sm35rx. I ageee with the other poster to click OK to switch between cameras. If I went through the Menu to select the camera individually it would freeze saying it can’t connect. Clicking OK easily switched without this issue.
customer_reviews.author: jill9109

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. This monitor lags and the constant white noise is so annoying. It’s constantly losing connection and does not take the charger anymore. I’ve only had it for four months and I literally had to tape the charger to the monitor for it to charge. Also it keeps shutting itself off and when I turn it back on the screen goes dark and the two way speaker also stopped working. The pan and doom function sucks, basically It’s not worth it I should have spent a few extra dollars and bought a trusted brand. So disappointed that I am going to have to by a new monitor so soon.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl rudy

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad product experience
customer_reviews.text: Bad experience with this product. Picture and night vision was good. I had bad connection issues. Didn't matter if I was 6" or 30 feet away the monitor would lose connection with the camera. This would happen every 5 mins and then it would be searching for connection for 30 to 40 mins. I can't only have eyes on my baby girl for 5 to 10 mins out of the hour each night. Not acceptable. I returned with no problems. Ups picked it up from my house and I got my refund the same day it was picked up from ups. I got a more expensive one and it is very much worth spending the extra 100 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Press OK to switch between cameras, NOT menu.
customer_reviews.text: Pairs well with my Similism SM24RX. Only issue I had so far was panic when I put my son down for his nap and the base was on the wrong camera. This resulted in me precariously climbing over my son to get to his monitor to pair it to the camera in his room. All of this could've been avoided if I'd read the FAQ's where it clearly says you press the OK button to switch between cameras, I was trying to do it through the menu. So. Thats way easier than climbing over a sleeping kid to re-pair a camera but that was definitely operator error.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Benterou

customer_reviews.title: This monitor gets all around top marks from me !
customer_reviews.text: I have a 96 year old, bed-ridden mother who keeps trying to get out of bed and I needed something to tell me when she was trying to do that with out startling her and making her fall. Babysense Video Monitor to the rescue!!!!!! I only had it set up for 2 days and it has already paid for itself! Totally easy to set up...........plug it in, let it charge up and turn it on !!!! Way easier than the security camera ! Great picture, day or night, I can hear all sounds in her room and she can hear me. The best part about it.......It was affordable !!!! I definitely recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Wndwalker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap battery quality and could not hold power after 1 year use
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the item in my baby shower registry and I regret buying it. Battery could not hold power after 1 year use. After 6 months fully charged battery used to last less than 20 minutes with display turned on. After 1 year of use, battery became non-existent and camera turns on only when it's connected to power outlet. After 2 years of use, now camera powers off automatically when try to talk to my kid thru "microphone" button. I have kept camera in excellent condition and no visible damage marks. Though running into various poor quality issues. Save your money and buy a quality camera instead of this fake "Amazon Choice" labelled product.
customer_reviews.author: GatorFan84

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind at great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!!! We have two WiFi monitors that are not reliable so I bought this as a third. There’s not a ton of settings options (tbh haven’t explored too much) But it gives me piece of mind. Battery lasts maybe 6 hours and has warning beep before dying. Lowest volume is still a bit high. I put it under a towel to muffle the static from our sound machine Plus you can take it anywhere and avoid WiFi set up
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Babysense video bay monitor fails to deliver on quality function and features
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor fails to provide an adequate video image, the sound quality is substandard, the battery life is marginal at best, and the overall quality is lacking. I felt that I had to give it at least 1 star since it does function, but it does that very poorly. It is a low budget made in China unit that is only worth half the price. Baby Sense design engineers need to go back to the drawing board. I would strongly suggest finding a different monitor than this one.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great product with excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 2 cameras and monitor set and it did not work properly, so I sent it back. Within a day, the company contacted me and asked what the issue was (which it kept trying to connect), and offered to send a replacement because they knew what their product was like and this type of problem was abnormal. I agreed and am super happy that I did because there is no interference with these cameras or monitor. It works perfectly both upstairs and across the house. This company offers a great product and an excellent customer service team.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Gilcrest

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Connection
customer_reviews.text: The connection on this monitor is crap. It's not connected to wifi which is nice but the connection comes and goes out like crazy. Battery lasts 8.5 hours, that's it. Then it beeps REALLY loudly to let you know. It's great that it let's you know but if it wakes the baby it doesn't matter that it's dying. My baby sleeps 9+ hours so I always have to plug it in when before the baby wakes up. For a cheapy monitor it works but when you lose connection it's awful. It literally must be at least 2 feet away from my phone if I'm using my phone or else the connection is all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've attempted to use the camera 5 times and all 5 times I've had to pair the monitor and camera before using it. If that was the only issue I could probably live with it (I've gotten good at it and have memorized the instructions on how to pair), however that's not the biggest issue. The camera itself is terrible. The picture constantly fades in and out. The screen will go completely white and then fade back to the picture for a few minutes, then will fade and go completely white again for a few seconds and fade back to the picture. Over and over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer service
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great, but we’ve been beyond impressed by their customer service. Our monitor was not charging after a year of use. I called on a Saturday morning and spoke with Richard about the issue. After speaking about the problem, he had a new parent unit in the mail within a couple of hours and it arrived at my home Monday. He included a prepaid envelope with the new parent unit for me to send back the old parent unit. He’s been very responsive and understanding throughout the process. I will continue to recommend this product to new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product...when it works. About a month in to using it the video stopped working. I called the seller via the info that came in the mail and a very nice man helped me reset it. Well, it worked for about a week and then quit working, now I’m outside the return window. Should have just returned it instead of resetting it. I tried resetting it again but it’s just broken. Now I’ve lost their phone number. We’ve just been using it as a regular monitor. The ability to talk to talk through the monitor is a really helpful feature.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had this monitor for approximately 5 months before the parent unit started having shorter and shorter battery charges. By 7 months, I could not use the parent unit without the power cord attached because the battery would not hold a charge. I called the company and spoke to someone right away. They sent out a new parent unit that day and I received it within two days. The customer service was great and the new parent unit holds a charge just like it should. I was disappointed with having an issue to begin with, but the issue was very quickly resolved by the company.
customer_reviews.author: Mill Hunky Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not all it’s cracked up to be!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is ok, but the battery dies quickly and the cords to recharge don’t charge the units without wiggling or taping them in a certain way. This unit stopped working properly just after a few months. The screen constantly flashes regardless of mode it’s in. Very disappointed that I have to get yet another monitor as this one won’t even charge anymore (even after buying new cords). Don’t waste your money on this one!!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. T

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because I heard horror stories about hacking into baby monitors, and this one runs on its own connection (not off of the WiFi). Beside that feature, however, it’s really not great. The battery life is dreadful, so we always keep it plugged in. Every little thing seems to interfere with the reception, so it can’t be by a television or near a lot of cell phones. The picture quality is grainy and poor. I really can’t think of anything good about this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first...
customer_reviews.text: We loved how compact and easy it was to use this monitor. I even shared about it several times on my blog. I really love the ECO feature so that the monitor doesn’t have to stay on all night. However, in the last two months, the monitor will only work if it’s plugged in and no longer holds a charge. At the same time, the ECO feature stopped working. I’ll click it and leave it on the low setting, but it stays on and doesn’t shut off like it use to. Both of these features stopping makes it hard to use or to recommend to my readers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Walker

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: At first, we really liked it. It is ok now. I've found a few things that bother me. Pros: small, lightweight. Night vision is good enough. Easy to use. Cons: I accidentally hit the pair and it didnt work after that. I had to manually pair it up again. Kind of a pain. keep the manual for later use. The cord to the camera easily moves the camera. It would be nice the base of the camera was heavier so it would be more stable. The plug in part gets a little warm when it's plugged in for a long time. Like the other reviews, I've also noticed the flash of brightness from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: blah blah

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor for price!
customer_reviews.text: This is, in my opinion, the best baby monitor for the price. I first bought the owlet monitor and spent hundreds of dollars on it and it was useless for us. (Had to have the app on and couldnt use your phone simultaneously). This has great range, great pic, good battery life. Portable and at a great price. If you're looking for a monitor where you can see clearly day and night, talk to your baby etc. At a good price. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a good monitor... ish. It's constantly flashing "waiting for connection"... I'm sitting in the room literally right next door to my daughter's. When it is working, there's a clear picture. The options are nice (music, additional cameras, temperature). But the actual function leaves some to be desired. Update: We were contacted by the manufacture with a resolution to the "connection" issue. The advice fixed the issue. I gave 4 stars, instead of 5 stars because I now have to be mindful of how close I have the monitor to my phone and other electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great price
customer_reviews.text: I looked online and in stores for the right monitor that would also be reasonable in price. I found this and am very happy! Pros: image is clear Sound works great Cool features to add music or talk through monitor Super easy to set up Great price Cons: Screen is a bit small I would totally recommend this model to friends.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Their customer service is amazing we were very happy with this product although a year and a half later the monitor would die quickly and lose connection. Contacted their customer service and they sent me out a replacement asap even though it was past a year. Im very happy our baby is upstairs and the connection is very strong we use the monitor in the garage and backyard and connection is super strong love it.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto C

customer_reviews.title: does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use to monitor my partner from my bedroom to hers. She was recently diagnosed with cancer and is in home hospice care. This allows me to sleep in my bed and she in hers (adjustable hospital type bed - very comfortable). The only problem is that I have to duct tape both receivers down - they move around too easily. I wish they had a solid sticky base so I could steady them without the duct tape. Otherwise, this monitor is exceptionally valuable and daylight and night vision are perfect! Small but mighty little monitor - love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the money. Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent range. For the size of the screen good quality video. Talk back volume is appropriate for the as a baby monitor but not for communication use (too quiet). I use mine to monitor a horse trailer, works through the metal body of the trailer and truck with no interference issues from the electronics. Do wish it had a wider field of view, need to set it back a ways. It's important to note that only the monitor has an internal battery, the camera needs a power supply (USB).
customer_reviews.author: Fire 304

customer_reviews.title: Great product, don't buy from anyone else!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 8 months ago. The on/off button stopped working about a month ago and I waited quite some time to call in and ask for a replacement. Mr. Andersen took care of me quickly. He didn't make me feel like I shouldn't be calling in to get a replacement. He didn't ask me a thousand questions on why it didn't work. He went through some troubleshooting with me and then immediately shipped me a new monitor. Thank you for making it painless to do business with you. I highly recommend this product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelin

customer_reviews.title: Nice to not reposition, re-pairing for each use sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Second camera is good to have but not much different than moving the first camera as I have to re-pair whichever unit I want to use. The monitor can connect to 4 cameras, it's stupid that you can't change cameras without having to pair the one you want to use. Also, having issues now with losing connection to camera. Loved it with no issues before getting second camera. Used for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A just ok monitor
customer_reviews.text: •Picture quality is good •Night vision is good but monitor does not dim very low so checking it at night is a wake up call. •Temperature is never right. The camera produces its own heat so the temperature always runs between 75 and 79 degrees (f) •Speaker on monitor is good quality. •speaker/mic on camera is so so. If using a white noise maker or a fan it drastically reduces what sounds it will pick up. •The music that is programmed with the monitor is very harsh and tinny. • The talk back feature is nice and works well. • Both the monitor and camera are a nice size. •Signal strength is so so.
customer_reviews.author: janina

customer_reviews.title: Product only lasted 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor each night to keep an eye on my daughter. After three months, the plug on the back of the camera had to be taped so that it was plugged in JUST SO or the camera would shut off. A few weeks later, the receiver has a difficult time receiving the signal from the camera. The receiver and camera are in the exact same place as they’ve always been. Picture and sound quality were fine, but the quality of the product is not good if it hasn’t lasted that long.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cady

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: The baby monitor works great. I bought it for when my grandchildren are visiting. It works as good or better than some of their higher priced monitors. I had misplaced one of my charging cords and wrote the company about a replacement since I didn't see any place to order it. They responded within a few hours and are sending me a replacement free of charge. I am very impressed with their customer service. They really do want to give a 100% satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Under5

customer_reviews.title: Good basic camera.
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper baby camera this one is perfect. It’s not top of the line but it’s not that expensive. We have 2 young kids so we have 2 cameras and the one parent unit. I love that i can scan between my daughter in her crib and set my 2 month old in the bassinet and go downstairs to work out and see them both. Picture quality isn’t super clear but its just fine to see them. I love the it has the temperature so i know to bundle up or take off clothes. It does go static if your phone is too close. But I’ve taken it outside to do yard work and still hear the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Marizzle

customer_reviews.title: Good Budget Monitor, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I like this baby monitor. It’s lightweight, compact, and gets the job done. I purchased a much larger and more expensive monitor that uses an app on your phone for you to view your baby and I found that I got a lot of false alerts for noise that was really annoying (we use a white noise sound machine in our baby’s room so maybe that is the reason for the constant noise alerts?). I prefer having a parent unit that isn’t on my phone. This baby monitor is a great price, has good range throughout our two story home, and the customer service was super, super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We were buying Samsung’s and other high end models. However, they kept failing...one after the other. This was, by far, the least expensive one we’ve purchased and has lasted the longest!! Really excellent value. Not as big of a screen, but that is super overrated. Small screen is fine. Battery life is good as well. Definite thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Video monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this. I live in a home that is 1,160 square feet. My child’s room is just at the top of the stairs from our room and the signal glitches horribly, especially if we have our tv on. When out in our living room, it looses signal constantly. Things that I love: good picture quality, you can talk to your child in their crib, you can choose a lullaby to play, it has day/night vision capabilities and it shows the room temperature. I would only recommend if you don’t plan on using this throughout your house and if your room is across the hall from your child.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Still works well after 10 months and baby trying to chew on the monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Have had it for 10 months now and video and sound quality are good. The video can be grainy compared to others when on night vision but I can see my baby well. Better picture when not on night vision but mostly keep the room dark. It does have a green light on the camera at night. I like the option of being able to have another camera in another room and be able to switch views, we do not have another camera so I can not attest to how that works.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son, it had good reviews and seemed to be a great deal. Unfortunately, we have had 2 problems with it which is important... first problem is that the battery life is not good at all. We have to charge it every night... early in the night! Second problem is the screen constantly whites out for several seconds. I am not sure what the problem is, but it is ridiculous. We do not recommend this baby monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Constant beep and updating.
customer_reviews.text: I have Been using this unit for about 2 months since purchase. It constantly beeps at me that it’s lost connection and reboots the picture. Our house is not big, from my room to Babies is about 20 feet and from kitchen to baby is less and it doesn’t matter where I put the monitor it beeps and tries updating. Update 6/29/20 Talked to company. They sent me a new piece to try to remedy the trying to connect and beeping. Customer service was excellent and they sent me a new piece. I got it paired and hooked it up and still had the same issues. They emailed again they would be sending me a brand new system.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: This works seamlessly with the original monitor and we’re glad we purchased a second camera
customer_reviews.text: We have our original camera set up in the baby’s room but wanted a second camera for our room where the baby currently sleeps in a bassinet. This works seamlessly with the original monitor and we’re glad we purchased a second camera. Very easy to install and can change from one camera to the next with the push of a button.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ECO mode is a godsend. Battery life is not great.
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t like this monitor because I’d felt cheap compared to our current one. After trying 4 different brands, this is the one I kept because of the silencing when there is no noise in the baby’s room. This monitor would be awesome if the battery life was a bit better and you could pan the room by the parent handheld part. I have to keep it plugged in during the night, otherwise it’ll be alerting us of a low battery in the middle of the night. Overall, It does a great job. Picture quality is excellent. ECO mode is the best.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lauzon

customer_reviews.title: Skip it!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint with this is the amount of times I have to hear this thing chirp as the screen flashes "Waiting for signal". Doesnt matter where I am in the house with this thing either. I can be in the next room, down the hall, or in the same room and it still chirps that it cant get signal. Its progressively gotten worse the longer we have had it. Do yourself a favor, buy something else or you'll go crazy hearing this garbage beep every 3 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Mandankurt

customer_reviews.title: Constant beeping from temp reading
customer_reviews.text: Edit* As of right now the handset isn't beeping. I unscrewed the back and out it back together and unplugged both units several times. There is no more thermostat beeping as of right now. The picture is clear and the monitor would be great if it would stop beeping. There's a built in temperature gauge which is completely off. It goes from 2 degrees to 98 degrees up and down and beeps non stop. I won't be able to use this at all. So disappointing. We CANNOT get it to stop beeping.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly on the third night
customer_reviews.text: So I just bought this two days ago and it was completely fine, all a sudden the third night all night it keeps losing service literally every 4 seconds, picture goes dark and even sound very frustrating and annoying that I spent money on something that just stops working properly the third night. I wouldn’t bother with this baby monitor definitely isn’t worth the headache, money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Review UPDATED. Flimsy camera power cord -- broken less than two months later
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After posting this review of the broken item, the seller reached out to me and sent me a brand-new baby monitor. Kudos to them and many thanks. The replacement seemed to be an upgraded version. The plug itself clicks in tightly, and so far, so good with everything working. that was the only complaint I had, that the plug on the camera itself did not stay plugged in and rendered the unit useless. Thanks again, Hisense Ltd. The micro plug on the camera itself was very flimsy, and now, less than two months after owning it, it's completely broken. Two weeks ago, it started being loose, and now it won't turn on at all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Average monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed emotions about this monitor. It will not last through the night without being on the charger. It is also really bright even on the lowest setting. I always sleep with the screen turned off, but if I have to turn it on, it is awful. Otherwise it does the job. Its quite durable and you can hook up numerous cameras to 1 screen. It also plays lullabies which can be useful. Id probably buy it again but i would consider other options first.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this monitor with the birth of our second child. The main selling point being, two cameras that link to a single monitor. The setup was easy, especially with the support email sent when I purchased the monitor. Additionally, we found the features of this set very useful. We had tried another poplular brand of monitor and this one far exceeds the other monitor in quality and functionality. This monitor was far easier to setup and we’ve experienced little to no cuttout of the signal due to interference.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: This is the best monitor. Don't bother with the ones that rely on your phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor. Unless you want to spend $200. This is the best monitor because it is extremely reliable. You can see everything you need to see, you can hear everything you need to here. The range is great. Do not buy one that relies on internet. This is the best one. Do not buy one that relies on your phone or tablet to be a screen trust me you'll regret it and you'll end up buying this anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Haishtaine

customer_reviews.title: The best customer service
customer_reviews.text: The best customer service, can't say the same about the product! The monitor stopped working after a few weeks, it lost reception and wouldn't connect to the camera and the lullabies never worked. I got in contact with the seller and immediately got a new one , free of charge or shipping, this was great from them and the new one works just fine! The quality of the image is not great and the vision is very narrow, you cant see the whole crib, but we got it for when we travel, we do that a lot and needed something that worked without wifi, so for its purpose its a good monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got the monitor and one camera for a baby shower gift. Had an issue with the first monitor and the company sent me a new one at no charge with zero hesitation. Ordered a second camera, shipped fast and super easy to connect. The product is excellent and a great price and the best customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi A.

customer_reviews.title: A good solution to my individual problem
customer_reviews.text: I care for a spouse with dementia, and I use this successfully to monitor her when she is asleep. Some of the only time I get to myself is this sleep period but if she wakes up and sits on the edge of the bed for to long she begins to feel alone, thus I can monitor her sleep and be there just as she is waking up. A good solution to my individual problem.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect add on camera for our existing unit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect add on camera for our existing unit. The original add on camera that was sent had some kind of glitch in the lens, but the customer service rep contacted me to rate my satisfaction with the product and I was able to arrange for a new camera with no hassle. It arrived within 3 days and works perfectly. The camera is of equal quality of the original unit and it is nice to be able to switch back and forth between cameras with a push of a button. Great product, price point, and customer service. Wouldn’t waste my time or money buying an expensive unit at local stores or online, this one is much better!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Linn

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what we needed! I’m very pleased with it. If you are one of those parents who needs top of the line fancy gadgets then this won’t bw for you. It’s super easy to use! Picture is good not great but does the job. We play white noise in the kids room so we had to set it at med to where it will detect noises and turn on and so far it has turned on every time that it should have. My only issue is it’s hard to get the camera in a good position and it doesn’t cover a lot of area but for what we needed it for it surpassed expectations. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: not really worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 2 weeks the songs cut in and out on the monitor, the screen will not stay on at times. I guess for 75 and change this is over priced. When it does decide to cooperate it works decent enough. I guess the best thing to do is set up a hard wired camera to get the best view but that will require a monitor and the smallest is about a 20 inch which will give off a lot of light so that really wont't work for some. It the monitor was more reliable then I would rate it much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Never in color
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is fine, but the picture is never in color and that was one of the things that drew me to it when I was first looking for monitors. Even in the daytime, I can only get a black and white image, except if I focus the camera on something directly in front of the window. The sound quality is good. The connection is not good. I can't keep it next to my laptop - have to keep it away or else the connection is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality on this monitor is great but the sound quality is SO bad that I ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our toddler’s room and moved the higher quality monitor into our newborn’s room. The picture quality on this monitor is great but the sound quality is SO bad that I can’t give it more than 1 star. Considering how important it is to hear your baby, I cannot, in good conscience, recommend this product. The speaker is in the BACK of the monitor, which is part of the problem on sound quality. Also, the sound is not clear, it’s static. Lastly, I lose connection with the monitor frequently and the error message states “waiting for connecting”. It doesn’t even make sense and it makes me angry every time I see it (every night).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda GB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a lightening deal and we are happy with the product. It has a good picture. And the camera has a excellent bending range to get in the position you need. The two way mic works great, very easy to understand on both sides. I have not tried the alarm or the music feature. I gave 4 stars only because you are unable to move the camera by the monitor it can only positioned manually, however as mentioned before it can be bent to many different angles. All in all we are pleased with the monitor and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: melinda davis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price, on par with Motorola
customer_reviews.text: All is well except the screen constantly flashes as if the lights in the room are being turned on and off in the room. Not a big deal but if you're sleeping next to it the flashing is a little annoying. We had Motorola before this and this never happened but that screen broke after one minor drop. This one has been dropped multiple times and still works fine. Only thing missing is the ability to swivel the screen which i prefer anyways so we don't accidentally move the screen
customer_reviews.author: James R Haile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect baby monitor for our needs. Our daughter was born this week and we needed to replace our 6 year old monitor we had for our first son. That one was not a good buy and was double to price of this one back then and double the size. This one is small and compact. Worked great. No set up needed at all. Just plugged both sides in and it started working right away. I like the ability to both hear the baby and also use microphone to talk to her if we need. And it’s small enough and light enough to use when we travel this summer. Great price for all the needs we have.
customer_reviews.author: Akiva Zablocki

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this company and this product. We got this product a year and a half ago for our son. It has worked great this entire time. We are now pregnant with our next son and fully intend to keep using this product. We bought an additional camera for this purpose. This week, the power cord for the monitor got a short in it, after a year and a half of wear and tear. I reached out to the company and they are sending me a new cord free of charge. They have great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Blankenbeker

customer_reviews.title: Nice night vision
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 2 months and it's been great. Opening the door makes my baby cry harder, so It's awesome to be able to watch her and see if she's just fussing to sleep, or needs to be picked up. After 2 months, the monitor buttons are working less than optimally. It takes 8 tries to turn the screen on/off, and turning the unit off entirely is sometimes impossible. I'm going to ask for a replacement, because otherwise it functions fine. Same issue others have with disconnecting, but it's like 1% of the time it's in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a much higher priced monitor after years of use and multiple instances of it being dropped. (Oops!) I found this unit and it had great reviews. We've used it for a few weeks and can see why people love it! The picture is clear in both daylight and night view, the sound quality is excellent, and you're able to talk to the child. Those were our main criteria and this exceeds our expectations! It's also very small compared to a lot of units, so we were able to easily pack it for a recent trip and have plans to make this our main travel unit in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Missy B.

customer_reviews.title: Babysense Video Baby Monitor with Infrared Night Vision, Two Way Talk Back, and more.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help me to watch my sick and dying Mom. It brought me some measure of comfort and security when I needed to be away from her bedside. The night time view took some getting used to, but did what I expected. The sound quality was very good, as was the daytime view. The battery did not last all too long, but I understand it was because of it being a video. It was also very easy to set up, and operate. The range was also a good distance. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: bioresp

customer_reviews.title: Dual camera failure. Do not buy this monitor!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of having 2 cameras to be able to monitor both my kids. Well the problem with that is the monitor decided jump between camera whenever it feels like it (at first I thought it was because of noise but it does it even when one of the cameras is completely unplugged). It jumping makes it IMPOSSIBLE to monitor my newborn. As you can see in the video it only takes a few seconds for it to go to the second camera (even when there is noise happening with the first camera). Moral of the story, do not buy this. I regret everything and wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 Story home
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2 story home so we looked for something that would have the reach and not be disturbed by to many walls and floors. After reading reviews we took the chance and we are so glad we did. The battery life is really good and while the night vision isn't the most crisp you can still see your little one without any issues. The picture is great and again like the night vision its not perfect but you can see just fine. For the price you really can't beat it truly.
customer_reviews.author: atwife

customer_reviews.title: Poor excuse for a camera system.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this as I got the bundle as a gift and just needed 2 extra cameras and a monitor for my other 2 kids but I was disappointed when the monitor arrived dead and took forever to charge. Then I couldn't get the monitors connected even though they should have already been. Not to mention the camera being zoomed in when it shouldn't of been and that it wouldnt stay on camera 2 for more than half a 2nd or share audio when my baby cried.
customer_reviews.author: Rya

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but battery capacity is poor over time
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was good when we first bought it (about 8 months ago), but has since been a disappointment. The picture quality is basic, nothing special. However, my biggest complaint is the battery life: we only charge it when it needs it (and therefore haven’t abused the battery), but now the monitor battery doesn’t last more than 7 hours fully charged. We thought we’d get a more modestly-priced unit, but months later, we’re going to have to buy another monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time mommy and with sooo many baby monitors out there it was sooo hard to pick a good one. Well after reading all the reviews I decided to give this one a shot, i was very happy with this purchase and quality is good, i cant complain & what I love is that i can have up to 4 cameras set in different areas and if i were to go over someones house I can take this along with me plug it in and boom! Overall a good good monitor. If you have any questions please feel free to ask me. Highly recommend this one! you will be pleased. Hope this review helps!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to monitor my two grandchildren when they visit us and are up in the playroom. They are very active toddlers and one is a climber. We tried to set up the camera but couldn't find any good spot that would show the majority of the room. I realized I needed a tilt/pan/zoom capability from the monitor. When we tested this product the picture and sound seemed to work fine. If you're seeking a monitor for an infant in crib I think it'll do the job. It just wasn't what we ended up needing.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Quit charging after limited use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor as a backup for travel or when staying with relatives. Monitor was a great purchase at first but after about 3-4 months with very limited use, the main monitor stopped charging and accepting power. I think it was due to a defective monitor not able to pick up that the charging cable was plugged in, as it would somewhat work if you wiggled the cord I will say the customer service was very good and sent us a replacement unit. I just don’t think this unit will be good for someone looking to use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Monitor screen went blank
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product in March 2018 and in just 9 months it stopped working. The screen just went blank and won’t show picture. Tried multiple restarts, charge longer nothing works. It seems there are others also who have faced similar issues with this product, if only I had read those before buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Animesh Kumar Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Good for a little while...
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product so much we ordered a 2nd one when we had our second baby. It worked wonderfully for about 3 months and then it started to have problems like not being able to turn off or on, not being able to put the screen to sleep. We missed the return window, so now we’re stuck with a malfunctioning monitor :-(
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Update - we have had this for 2 weeks now and unfortunately the battery life has already started to die off more quickly than when we first got it. We have only had this monitor for 2 days but so far it is really good! It is much better than my last monitor, the picture quality is great and I really like the 3 ECO sleep levels, The lullabies seem great but we haven't needed them yet. So far it meets my expectations and is a great monitor for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second baby monitor we've purchased. Our first, a totally different brand, had a lot of issues with the monitor. We're pretty happy with this new monitor. The picture is good although it does sometimes appear to be a little choppy. Our monitor stopped turning off (giving me flashbacks to our previous monitor nightmares) so I reached out to their customer service. They were fantastic! They sent us a new monitor and everything is working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Shanbear16

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April 2018, after working for 8 months the monitor will no longer charge. I emailed customer service and will update with their response. This monitor is ok. Just ok. I have another brand that we prefer because we can move the camera around the room from the monitor and that has been particularly helpful and not available on this monitor. The battery is an issue, it only last a few hours and now isn’t working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Helmstetler

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is decent for the price. I do have some problems with the video going completely white for a few seconds and then its fuzzy then it will go back to normal. The monitor also disconnects from the camera often and it will say "connecting to network " for a few seconds then be fine again. I cant go far from the camera with the monitor either without it disconnecting. The sound works great, i can hear my 3 and 5 year old whispering to each other at night and it picks up every sound my newborn makes. The talk back feature is good too, a little loud on the other end but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ayer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor in November/December 2017. This is a fabulous monitor that does more than just offer a vivid picture. It will wake your caregiver on a set time schedule to check on your loved one .... We have tried several inferior models during the past 3 years for use with my elderly mom. One charging cord was recently misplaced and we were unable to charge the camera unit. Richard at Customer Service couldn’t have been kinder or more quick to react and immediately sent me a new charging cord.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Customer Service A+++
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works great for what is a very economical price. We can see our child clearly enough, and hear him very well. The "eco" feature is very nice so that there isn't constant static noise. What's especially *wonderful* about this company is their customer service. I wrote them with a question about the charging cord and got an immediate response from a real person, who asked me to call him. Upon explaining my problem, he told me exactly what to do, and then immediately issued a replacement part to me. I can't overstate what a lovely customer service experience this was - I was really blown away with the help I received. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Witmer

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Satisfied+Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: So this unit is pretty good. The night vision and overall picture quality are good. It's not 4k or anything, but who needs that? You can clearly see the child and even zoom in if you like. Additionally, the customer service is excellent. Had a unit that had a volume issue, I reached out, talked to the guy on the phone. He troubleshot with me for a few minutes, then sent me a replacement. I cannot stress how nice it is to have a normal interaction with somebody, not on a script, and have them address my need so completely. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Our baby monitor worked great for about 3 days; good quality and a reasonable price. After 3 days ours suddenly stopped working and couldn’t connect. I returned the item to Amazon for a refund. The company reached out to me and not only sent me a refund, but also send me a new, working baby video monitor. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsreadsbooks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent but not very loud
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was quite disappointed as the parent piece stopped charging. However the co made it right by sending out a new part. Picture quality very good. Doesn't have a super long range and the volume doesn't go up very high. As long as you are in range you would hear a baby crying. I use it to monitor my elderly mother who speaks very quiet and sleeps with a fan on so its hard to hear her.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Buck

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of white noise on the monitor, but you can hear the baby when they cry. I do not have any music or anything in the room so not sure what white noise or background noise it is picking up. It just sound like static noise, once you get used to it you do not even really hear it. Sometimes we have the baby's room door closed and the door to the living room closed and the connection goes in and out. It works well and happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kanani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor with clear picture at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review as the company sent me a replacement monitor to correct the slight issue. Its really a great product and the company stands by it. ----- (original review) Very nice monitor with clear picture at a great price. My only issue is that the display on the monitor has developed two annoying horizontal lines which block the image slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Mukaking

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace an old monitor for ware and tear reasons and didn't want to spend a lot. For this price, I really can't complain. I'm giving four stars instead of five because the camera did not have much flexibility as far as setting it up and getting the right angle to have a good view on the monitor. We ended up placing a rag under the camera to prop it up to achieve the angle we needed. Also it is very lightweight which became a disadvantage, again, with trying to set up the camera. Other than that the size and clarity of the monitor is sufficient and it was easy to pair a second camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor and fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic monitor, especially at this price point! You can speak to the baby via the parent unit, sound is clear, picture is great, it displays room temperature, plays lullabies, and has “eco” mode. Eco mode turns he picture off and mutes the monitor until it detects sound. It’s great, because otherwise there’s always white noise and we were listening to our baby’s sound machine all night until we discovered that feature. We did run into an issue where the picture on our parent unit froze, so I contacted Babysense. Their customer service was fantastic! They were very friendly on the phone and sent out a new parent unit the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Acord

customer_reviews.title: Very Clear Picture, Would Reccomend to Others.
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor/camera. I didn't have one with a camera when my first child was born and really wish I would have. You can really see the baby with the clear picture on the monitor. The night mode works wonderful, just wish I could dim the display a bit more, it is very bright at night, even at the lowest setting, but I don't think it should lose a star just for that as it makes a good night light if you want that. I would definitely recommend this to others looking for a baby monitor/camera.
customer_reviews.author: SHays

customer_reviews.title: Great seller! Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: There was something wrong with the battery or connection in my first one, but I love the size of the monitor, features and clarity of the screen so I contacted the seller for assistance. They were very responsive and sent me a replacement with expedited shipping. Easy to work with. Great monitor! It even beeps when the battery is dying so you are alerted.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after a couple months of using this sporadicly throughout the DAYTIME for naps, the battery no longer holds a charge. I had this charging all night long, and just went to use it. It is showing low battery. I would not recommend wasting your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: We've had this baby monitor for one month now and have been very impressed with it. As first time parents, we have gone through a few monitors to find one that works and this one is it! I will say that the first monitor we received from Babysense was defective - the monitor was making a lot of background noises. We contacted them right away and they sent us a new monitor within days...great customer service! So far, no complaints! It does have a small screen, but for the price, you really can't go wrong. It does exactly what it's suppose to do...happy mama here!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this video monitor, easy to use (especially for baby sitters/grandparents) great battery and good picture quality for the price. The cameras are naturally very zoomed in, so if you are wanting to see the entire room in a smaller space that will be hard, but it shows our kids beds which is what we were wanting. Our parent unit suddenly stopped working after 6 months so I emailed Babysense, and was blown away by their customer service. They worked with me to see what the problem was and then sent me a new unit very promptly free of charge! I believe a company’s customer service speaks volumes about them, and I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: and sound are good, but camera is not meant to be mounted ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture, and sound are good, but camera is not meant to be mounted on a wall. We put ours on the wall, so kids don't mess with it and it doesn't tilt up to see more than crib. The power cord is also short, which prevent being able to place higher in room to see more. Also the temp gauge does not work, it always says it is high 70° to low 80° in room, we have a fan in there to keep it cooler.
customer_reviews.author: C. S

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. We got it as a replacement for our infant optux unit that kept requiring replacement and having charging issues. I like that this monitor can be set to stay on video the whole time, and the battery life is great. Only feature I miss is panning the camera, but if you mount it on the right place you're fine . Great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down quickly, beware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor ten months ago and about three months ago the battery life started declining, the audio would pop and crackle randomly (and loudly) throughout the night, and then it got to the point where the display unit would only work when plugged in (zero charge ability) Now the charge connector won’t work unless you wiggle it (very loose connection) and even then it will only charge for 60-90 seconds before connection is lost again. Simply put, it just doesn’t work. Unless you only need a working monitor for six months, look elsewhere. These break down very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointment in this product.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this product and she gave it an ok review for the money. I noticed when at her house the the connection goes in and out and the distance is 20 ft away from baby's room. I purchased one for my home and the picture clarity is NOTHING like they show in the ad or on the box! I have tried getting closer to the subject, more lighting (which doesn't work if you want baby to sleep) as well as angle of the camera. The speaker if you want to speak to your child is frightening...I would never use it! I will return this one, may or may not try another just in case this has a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Armand Gagne

customer_reviews.title: Used for monitoring a nighttime wanderer.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera to add to our babsense camera, giving us a total of 3 cameras. I like that the system can accept up to 4 cameras. We use this to monitor an elderly dementia relative who wanders at night. The volume setting alerts me when she is up and the camera covers a large area for observing her discreetly. This has been a tremendous help in keeping her safe!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great monitor for the money. Downsides are the camera doesn’t have an off switch it is always on when plugged in. The battery doesn’t last very long if you use the screen but not horrible. The temperature is completely inaccurate though, I don’t use the temp so not a concern for me. We have had a few issues with connection and the night vision going in and in and out but overall very happy with this and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Don’t. Battery is awful, charging nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life ruins this good monitor. The charger now also won’t stay connected. We received this in July as part of our registry completion and loved that’s it’s not WiFi. Started using it in December because we had baby in our room from August until then. It no longer holds a charge and it is March. December to March is not good quality and it’s outside the return window. That’s ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super reliable!
customer_reviews.text: So reliable!!! So much better than the expensive wifi one from safety first that we had before! Great connection. I feel so much better. We bought a wifi one before and had to return it. The pictures would freeze up showing my baby sleeping when she is actually awake and moving around. I felt constantly stressed out and unsure if pictures i was seeing on the screen is live and had to keep making sounds to confirm it. So we bought this cheaper regular one and what a relief!
customer_reviews.author: Christoph Clüver

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor and Great Customer Service !!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for over 3 months now and do not have a single thing to complain. It's so easy to set up and the lulabies are a life saver at times, puts our lil one to sleep when she wakes up at times in mid of her sleep. Their customer service has to be mentioned, we had an accidental spil on the parent monitor and mailed the customer centre on how to buy just the parent unit and to our surprise they sent a replacement unit absolutely for free. Super impressed !!
customer_reviews.author: Shijin Venugopalan

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor for the price. Have had it for a couple weeks and no problems from it. The camera comes with a screw to mount it to the wall but it was light enough to attach with a sticky tab. Picture is not perfect HD but it is clear enough to see everything...the zoom mode helps to see baby breathing. The music sounds a bit creepy like out of a horror movie but I never intended to use the music. Overall for the price it is a good deal, no need to spend hundreds on another video monitor when this works for 80.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to setup as it comes already paired and ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup as it comes already paired and ready to go! Plugged in the camera, turned on the handheld monitor screen - that had some juice in the battery already - and was back out in the living room with friends in under 5 minutes. It's very lightweight and unobtrusive. There's also the opportunity to turn off the screen and just use the sound option so we can keep monitoring at night without a light on in the room. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schein

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality. Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this baby monitor initially with my first child, as a lightweight video monitor to take on trips with us. It has been perfect for us! The picture is really clear. Night vision is also great. It’s small to throw in a suitcase. We also now use it for our 2nd child at home and set it up in different rooms. It’s very portable and light weight. Highly recommend. One of our power cords stopped charging after a year and a half or so. I reached out to the company and they sent me a replacement cord, no problem. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Babysense Video Baby Monitor with Camera and Audio, Long Range, Room Temperature, Infrared Night Vision, Two Way Talk Back, Lullabies, VOX and Long Battery Life
feature_bullets: HAVE A PEACE OF MIND – Our Baby Monitor with Camera allows monitoring your baby’s sleep with 2.4 Inch High Quality Color LCD Display, providing high quality and stable streaming, secure hacking-free connection and crystal clear digital vision & sound. Your baby deserves the best care.

SOOTHE & COMFORT YOUR BABY: Use the two-way audio or the programmed lullaby sounds to calm your baby remotely. So you can comfort your baby with the sound of your own voice, sometimes our little angels just need to hear our voice!

STAY CONNECTED TO YOUR BABY – There's nothing more stressful than not knowing what your little one is doing. That is why our Babysense portable baby monitor features long range of up to 900 feet (OPEN SPACE), which does not require wifi (no hacking risks) and allows you to move freely in your house or yard and sleep better at night.

SEE YOUR BABY DAY AND NIGHT – We use the latest infrared night vision technologies so you can rest assured knowing you’ll see your baby day and night with this video monitor. And with the 2x digital zoom you will never have any doubts about your baby’s activities. Besides the auto night vision, you can also check the room temperature and make use of high/low temperature alerts.

WIDE VARIETY OF EXTRA HANDY FEATURES – Our audio video baby monitor is a perfect idea for baby gifts and baby showers - It comes with: Eco Mode Voice Activation, Sound Activated LEDs, Alarm/Timer Setting, Multi-Camera Expandability (up to four cameras), Manual Pan (360 degrees) & Tilt (60 degrees), Auto Camera Scan View, Tabletop or Wall Mounting Options. Our original Babysense video baby monitor comes with a 1-YEAR Manufacturer's Warranty and hassle-free 90-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

specifications.Safety warning: Read User Guide before installing and using the product
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars3,293 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
